Title: Hunters of Huanchi with Starstone Bolas
Legend: Sometimes, the task entrusted to a Hunters of Huanchi cohort will force them to close with an enemy. These Seraphon often wield deadly starstone bolas, close-quarters weapons that can explode in bursts of purging starlight.
Intro: Each model in a Hunters of Huanchi with Starstone Bolas unit is armed with a Starstone Bolas and Moonstone Club.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Shadowstrike Starhost • Shadowstrike Temple-host

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Chameleon Skink Alpha. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Moonstone Club.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Huanchi’s Claw
Rules.Rule: HUANCHI’S CLAW: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Huanchi’s Claw. This model is armed with a Hunter Javelin instead of a Starstone Bolas and Moonstone Club.

Rules.Name: Perfect Mimicry
Rules.Fluff: Chameleons lurking amid dense terrain are hard to spot.
Rules.Rule: This unit is not visible to enemy units that are more than 12" away or while it is in cover.

Rules.Name: Starstone Bolas
Rules.Fluff: A perfectly timed bolas throw can either ensnare an enemy or detonate to leave the foe reeling.
Rules.Rule: If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Starstone Bolas is 6, the target unit is stunned until the end of the following combat phase. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by a unit that is stunned.
